Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

AIL_3D_sample_loop_count

The function AIL_3D_sample_loop_count returns the number of loops remaining in the specified sample.

U32 AIL_3D_sample_loop_count(
  H3DSAMPLE S
);

In Parameters

S
indicates the sample handle to query.

Returns

The remaining loop count.

Discussion

Each time the sample loops, the value returned from this function will decrease by 1.


Group: 3D Digital Audio Services
Related Functions: AIL_set_3D_sample_loop_count
Related Basic Types: H3DSAMPLE, U32
